column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Once your casserole arrives
column2: your server will chop up your initial pieces
column3: and then its game time. The crust is crispy
column5: and oh so buttery. The sauce is rich with flavor
column6: and will knock your socks off. The large chunks of italian sausage will not leave you wanting. And to top it off
column7: slices of crispy pepperoni complete the absolutely amazing casserole.
